Html:
Hello,
I'm new in PHPExcel, i installed the 6.2 version and use the PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5, this work fine, i can create my Excel files.
My problem is when i want to open another Excel file witch have referenced cells on the file created with PHPExcel,
it's ok for numbers but for all text it's only displayed #N/A. Has anybody an idea why?
Is the PHPExcel-generated file displayed correctly in Excel?

Yes, the PHPExcel-generated file is correctly displayed in Excel (I work with Excel 2003 and Windows XP Pro).
The problem arises only in the file Excel in which are cells referenced on the file Excel created by PHPExcel.
